name: iMemories
tag_list: home-movies, video, film, online-video-sharing, video-editing, video-conversion, video-transfer, film-transfer, digitize-video, digitize-film, digitize-home-movides, scan-photos, archive-home-movies, host-home-movies, video-to-dvd, vhs-to-dvd
overview: iMemories brings families and friends together by providing a single Web destination to enjoy, share and celebrate their most treasured moments captured via videos and photos. Founded in 2006, iMemories is the only Internet-based service that allows consumers to preserve and store their memories online, regardless of the original media format, and share across multiple consumer platforms, ranging from televisions and mobile phones to popular social networks and blogs. iMemories connects generations of families to their memories, from vintage home movies and photographs to modern digital videos, safely and conveniently in premium digital quality.

funding_rounds.source_description: iMemories Raises $6.2 Million For Photo, Video Sharing

milestones.description: iMemories received $3.6M in Series A funding.
